summary: Implement a From trait conversion to pass WorkerResult from Rust into Ruby using interop. This is a technical infrastructure issue for the Ruby SDK's Rust bridge layer.
userImpact: Enables proper data passing between Rust runtime and Ruby code through standardized conversion traits.
proposedFix: Implement `impl From<WorkerResult>` for Ruby interop layer
resolutionDetails: From trait implementation was added to enable WorkerResult passing to Ruby
keyQuote: Pass WorkerResult into Ruby land using `impl From<WorkerResult>`
